articles.author: Carla Babb
articles.title: More Attacks on US Forces Following Strike on Iran-Backed Targets in Syria - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Attacks now total 52 in less than a month, US defense officials report
articles.content: Pentagon  Iranian-backed militants have attacked U.S. forces in Iraq and Syria at least four times in the past 24 hours, raising the number of attacks to 52 in less than a month, U.S. defense officia… [+2168 chars]
